description:
Well maintained easy to follow.
This trail is in the general area of:
directions:
Take Jingle Pot Road West from Nanaimo, cross Hiway 19, Left on Westwood Road to end (don't go down Arbot road).
Parking and start at N49 09.789 W123 59.832
title: Mt. Benson from Westwood Lake, the long way
